reviewtext: Ordered this item - received the "version 4.1" model (FYI).  Ended up having to call tech support to get it working because its default IP address is the same of Verizon's DSL modems.  Tech support took a total of 55 minutes of dealing with multiple people and trying redundant tests to get it resolved.  I've gone through 3 of these in the past 5 years, they don't seem to have a long lifespan.  Still, they're the best of a sorry lot.
